features: 【Sturdy Frame & Premium Silver Mirror】 Iron frame and base, durable, safe, and reliable; HD environmentally friendly copper-free silver mirror design, higher image clarity, natural and soft light. Our makeup mirror makes makeup and shaving easier

【Dimmable Touch Control】 LED one-button touch to adjust 3 colors (3000K/4000K/6000K) dimming (10%-100%) to make your makeup mirror lifelike. The smart memory always kept the best setting to help you show your beautiful self

【Perfect Gift for Her】The desk mirror with light can be an elegant decoration for both your bedroom and vanity area. It is the best gift for her, Birthday gift, Valentine's Day gift, Mother's Day gift, Christmas gift and dorm room essentials for college students girls!

【360°Rotation & 5V Power Cord】 360-degree free rotation can fix at any position to give you the perfect viewing angle. The 5V/1A power cord is provided to save you from the trouble of charging.(Can only be connected to a power source for use, not rechargeable)

【Excellent Customer Service】 12 Months Warranty! The mirror comes with customized packaging to protect the mirror in all aspects. If there are any problems when you receive the makeup mirror, please feel free to contact us,we will back to you within 24 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Stronger Iron Frame Compared with cheaper metal or plastic frames, our iron frames are stronger and more durable. It looks more textured Safe and Durable Led Light Built-in energy-saving LED strip light to reduce energy consumption, 75000+ hours lifespan. 102 Pcs LED Lights Compared with the 72PCS lamp bead design, our 102PCS lamp band design makes the light more uniform and your makeup perfect

Free Rotation Design The tabletop vanity mirror can achieve 360° free rotation and be fixed to the optimal position so that you can get a perfect makeup viewing angle Perfect Size The size of the vanity mirror for makeup is 16.54''x13.78'', allowing you to get your entire face in view at once but spare more space for your vanity desk. 5V/1A Power Cord It comes with a 5V/1A power cord, The 5V cord can only be connected to a 5v plug (plug not include), or directly connected to the USB interface only connected with power source for use ,not rechargeable version.

The Ideal Gift It is a perfect gift for family and friends on Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Birthdays, Parties, Performances, etc. For all girls, it is their dream to have such a makeup mirror. If you want to surprise your girlfriend, wife, daughter, or mom, get this makeup mirror ready. Imagine how excited she will be when she sees the new mirror on her desk.

What can the LED makeup mirror be used for? 102 dimmable and 3-color led lights perfect for makeup, skincare, shaving, hair combing, etc This makeup vanity mirror with lights adopts Side-Emitting LED Tech, not dazzling and protects your eyes, then offers you soft, natural, and bright daylight, which gives great assistance in dark or poorly lit areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Large, attractive looking mirror with good lighting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality mirror with a very bright light and touch screen. My teen daughter was happy. Bigger than we expected. Reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and quality
reviews.reviewText: Light is perfect for make up application on a sunny day, and on a wintry dark day, you have a great reflection and great coverage all over

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Our first mirror did not work when I arrived. Contacted them and they responded within 24 hours. We had a new one within a week. Very responsive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror for preteen.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered for daughter for Christmas. First mirror came cracked. I was able to replace easily through Amazon and second mirror arrived undamaged. The mirror is a perfect size for sitting on daughters desk and she likes that there are different choices for the light. Seems to be made well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and perfect.
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is the perfect addition to my vanity. The lights are awesome and help make sure that you are covering your make-up right. I love that it moves and tilts. It makes me feel princess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful mirror! I got it for Christmas for my daughter and she absolutely loved it. We had some missing screws, but emailed the company and the responded within the hour to have them replaced. I totally recommend this mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pristine condition…but won’t turn on!
reviews.reviewText: This arrived doubled boxed and padded, it’s beautiful, the perfect size for my vanity area, I was so excited! Unfortunately, it does not power on. I’m so sad! There is no obvious issue and I’ve tested it on multiple outlets. I’ve also tried pressing the “button” multiple ways (wasn’t sure if it’s body heat/touch activated). Bummed, but I’ve ordered a replacement and hope the second works beautifully!
